@Syrillia wrote:

Make an ‘if’ to check if you have money. If you have the money then it takes it away, if you don’t then it says ‘You need more money!’

item.title: Bug. trying to make camelot tele give an item
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“zhstyle, post:1, topic:162569”]Sorry if my spelling is good.

Im having a problem trying to make the camelot tele give you items for money
When i click it i get the item and it take the money but when i click it again
When i dont have the money. it give me the items still

[sub]This is the code[/sub]

[code]if (s == “camelot”)
{

deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 14300000);
addItem(3140, 1);
addItem(1149, 1);
addItem(1187, 1);
addItem(4087, 1);
sendMessage("You now have full dragon!.");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" got the drag set for 14.3m. and "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players Online.";
} else {
sendMessage("You need 14.3m To buy sorry.");
 }

[/code][/quote]

Try…

if (s == "camelot")
if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 14300000)==true) {
             deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 14300000);
	addItem(3140, 1);
	addItem(1149, 1);
	addItem(1187, 1);
	addItem(4087, 1);
	sendMessage("You now have full dragon!.");
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" got the drag set for 14.3m. and "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players Online.";
	} else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 14300000)==false) {
	sendMessage("You need 14.3m To buy sorry.");
     }

Read full topic
